Class WeightsCalc

java.lang.Object
  WeightsCalc

public class WeightsCalc
extends java.lang.Object

WeightsCalc is a prototype to test some concepts for a simple program It works out how many weights you should put on one side of a barbell given a target weight, the weight of your bar and your available weights. When run WeightsCalc will ask the user from the command line to input the weight of their bar. The it asks for the number and weights of the plates owned. Then it asks for a target weight and performs the calculation. If the user doesn't have the required plates to meet their target it shall warn them and suggest a configuration that will get them as near as possible to their target.

Version:
20/May/2015
Author:
Laurence Meynell
